text: unge mamsa ho unge rudhiraya ho allah veta nolæbennemaya. enamut ohu veta læbenuye numbala aturin vu biya bætimatkamayi. numbalata ohu maga penvu dæ venuven numbala allah va sresthatvayata pat karanu pinisa api un vasanga kara dunnemu. tavada dæhæmiyanhata (nabivaraya!) numba subharamci danva sitinu
